realtime_memories.content: All 6 steps of extraction pipeline complete: (1) cell mapping validated, (2) single file test, (3) mapping gaps checked, (4) batch extraction 28 files → 30,394 values across 26 properties (run ID: 184f52e2), (5) frontend wired to real data, (6) scheduler/monitor enabled.

VITE_API_URL fix: Shell env had VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:8000 (without /api/v1). Fixed src/lib/config.ts to always append /api/v1 to base URL. src/lib/api.ts and feature hooks now import API_URL from config.ts as single source of truth.

Scheduler config: Extraction runs twice daily (cron: 0 2,14 * * * Phoenix). File monitor polls SharePoint every 30 min with auto-extract on change. Both initialized in app/main.py lifespan. Env vars in backend/.env: EXTRACTION_SCHEDULE_ENABLED=true, FILE_MONITOR_ENABLED=true.
User preference: Be extremely clear and explicit about what actions the user needs to take. Don't assume context — state clearly if no action is needed. User prefers directness over hedging.

28 files extracted → 26 unique properties because 2 files produced no ExtractedValue rows (likely empty property name cells). Each property has exactly 1,169 fields across 11 categories. [Investment Name] is template placeholder, not a real property.

Consolidated 10 → 5 memories. Removed task notifications, truncated summaries, and duplicate context. Kept: project completion status, technical fixes, config decisions, user preferences, and data exp
